description: Generates a summary of managed instance/node metadata based on the filters and aggregators you specify. Results are grouped by the input aggregator you specify.

parameters.name: SyncName
parameters.description: The name of the Amazon Web Services managed resource data sync to retrieve information about. For cross-account/cross-Region configurations, this parameter is required, and the name of the supported resource data sync is AWS-QuickSetup-ManagedNode. For single account/single-Region configurations, the parameter is not required.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: One or more filters. Use a filter to generate a summary that matches your specified filter criteria. (dict) --- The filters for the operation. The name of the filter. A filter value supported by the specified key. For example, for the key PlatformType, supported values include Linux and Windows. (string) --- Type (string) --- The type of filter operator.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: A filter value supported by the specified key. For example, for the key PlatformType, supported values include Linux and Windows.

parameters.name: Aggregators
parameters.description: Specify one or more aggregators to return a count of managed nodes that match that expression. For example, a count of managed nodes by operating system. (dict) --- One or more aggregators for viewing counts of nodes using different dimensions. The aggregator type for limiting a node summary. Currently, only Count is supported. The data type name to use for viewing counts of nodes. Currently, only Instance is supported. The name of a node attribute on which to limit the count of nodes. Aggregators (list) --- Information about aggregators used to refine a node summary.

nested_params.name: AggregatorType
nested_params.description: The aggregator type for limiting a node summary. Currently, only Count is supported.

nested_params.name: TypeName
nested_params.description: The data type name to use for viewing counts of nodes. Currently, only Instance is supported.

nested_params.name: AttributeName
nested_params.description: The name of a node attribute on which to limit the count of nodes.

nested_params.name: Aggregators
nested_params.description: Information about aggregators used to refine a node summary.

nested_items.name: Summary
nested_items.description: A collection of objects reporting information about your managed nodes, such as the count of nodes by operating system.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use when requesting the next set of items. If there are no additional items to return, the string is empty.
